metadata.title: LAMA Indicator Matrix
metadata.description: Local Adaptation Monitoring and Assessment Indicators

indicators.rawIndicator: Increased water access
indicators.ammendedIndicator: % of households with access to clean and reliable water sources year-round

indicators.rawIndicator: Presence of clean water from the community springs
Having rainwater harvesting facilities
